name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon UK Right Click Search and Switch

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Amazon.co.uk using a right-click. Switch back and forth between the UK/USA sites for products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Allows you to quickly search Amazon.co.uk by selecting text and right-clicking. 
* Also allows you to switch to the Amazon.co.uk version of a page if you're on the Amazon.com site and vice-versa. 

(Note: not all products/pages will have .com/co.uk equivalent)
